name: Frisbee For Fun
description:
Frisbee For FUN!
Frisbee is joy, Frisbee is fun!
You are a very mischievous kitten that uses helpless chickens as targets.

  • The distance may vary;
  • Chickens will start to run;
  • Portals will appear;
  • The wind will drive you crazy!

What to expect? Hit targets, but be careful ... being a bad kitten can have consequences.

Freedom to the chickens!
